body_content.explanation: a sexual interest in an object or a part of the body other than the sexual organs:
examples: He has a fetish for high heels.
It is possible to develop a fetish about almost anything.

body_content.explanation: an interest in an activity or object that makes someone spend an unreasonable amount of time doing it or thinking about it:
examples: She makes a fetish of organization - it's quite obsessive.
He has a fetish for cleanliness.
Her fetish about the colour aqua is well known to all her friends.

body_content.explanation: an object that is worshipped in some societies because it is believed to have a spirit or special magical powers
